statements: SELECT * FROM plastic_pollution_in_oceans;
SELECT agency_name, pollution_type, pollution_amount FROM plastic_pollution_in_oceans;
SELECT * FROM plastic_pollution_in_oceans WHERE pollution_type = 'Microplastics';
SELECT agency_name, report_date FROM plastic_pollution_in_oceans ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT agency_name FROM plastic_pollution_in_oceans;
SELECT agency_name, pollution_type, pollution_amount, report_date FROM plastic_pollution_in_oceans ORDER BY report_date DESC, agency_name ASC
SELECT * FROM plastic_pollution_in_oceans WHERE pollution_amount > 1000 ORDER BY pollution_amount DESC
SELECT agency_name, SUM(pollution_amount) AS total_pollution FROM plastic_pollution_in_oceans GROUP BY agency_name
SELECT DISTINCT agency_name FROM plastic_pollution_in_oceans
SELECT * FROM plastic_pollution_in_oceans WHERE pollution_type = 'plastic bags'
SELECT * FROM government_agency;
SELECT agency_name, agency_location FROM government_agency;
SELECT * FROM plastic_pollution_data WHERE pollution_level > 50;
SELECT agency_name, pollution_type, pollution_level FROM government_agency JOIN plastic_pollution_data ON government_agency.agency_id = plastic_pollution_data.agency_id;
SELECT * FROM plastic_pollution_data WHERE date_collected BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM government_agency ORDER BY agency_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM plastic_pollution_data WHERE pollution_level > 50 ORDER BY date_collected ASC;
SELECT agency_name, COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM government_agency GROUP BY agency_name HAVING total_entries > 1;
SELECT agency_name, pollution_type, pollution_level FROM government_agency INNER JOIN plastic_pollution_data ON government_agency.agency_id = plastic_pollution_data.agency_id;
SELECT MAX(pollution_level) AS max_pollution_level, MIN(pollution_level) AS min_pollution_level FROM plastic_pollution_data;
SELECT * FROM Ocean_Pollution_Data ORDER BY pollution_level DESC
SELECT agency_name, location FROM Ocean_Pollution_Data WHERE pollution_level > 5
SELECT * FROM Cleanup_Records WHERE cleanup_date > '2022-01-01' AND cost < 500
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Analysis_Results WHERE cleanup_success = TRUE
SELECT agency_name, pollution_level, location FROM Ocean_Pollution_Data ORDER BY location
SELECT * FROM Ocean_Pollution_Data WHERE pollution_level > 50 ORDER BY location DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT agency_name, location FROM Ocean_Pollution_Data WHERE location LIKE 'Pacific%'
SELECT * FROM Cleanup_Records WHERE cost BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY cleanup_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT agency_id, cleanup_date, cost FROM Cleanup_Records INNER JOIN Ocean_Pollution_Data ON Cleanup_Records.agency_id = Ocean_Pollution_Data.id
SELECT * FROM Analysis_Results WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' AND cleanup_success = TRUE
SELECT * FROM government_agencies;
SELECT agency_id, agency_name FROM government_agencies ORDER BY agency_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM plastic_pollution_data WHERE pollution_level > 50;
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM ocean_regions WHERE region_id = 3;
SELECT agency_name, agency_type FROM government_agencies JOIN plastic_pollution_data ON government_agencies.agency_id = plastic_pollution_data.agency_id;
SELECT * FROM government_agencies;
SELECT agency_id, agency_name FROM government_agencies WHERE agency_type='Government';
SELECT * FROM plastic_pollution_data WHERE pollution_level > 5 ORDER BY pollution_level DESC;
SELECT region_name, report_date FROM ocean_regions JOIN ocean_pollution_reports ON ocean_regions.region_id = ocean_pollution_reports.region_id;
SELECT agency_name, pollution_type FROM government_agencies JOIN plastic_pollution_data ON government_agencies.agency_id = plastic_pollution_data.agency_id WHERE pollution_level < 3;
SELECT * FROM government_agency;
SELECT agency_id, agency_name FROM government_agency WHERE location = 'City';
SELECT data_id, agency_id, date_collected, pollution_level FROM pollution_data ORDER BY date_collected DESC;
SELECT region_id, region_name FROM ocean_regions WHERE region_id > 2;
SELECT report_id, data_id, region_id, source_id FROM pollution_reports WHERE source_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM government_agency WHERE agency_id = 1;
SELECT agency_name, location FROM government_agency WHERE agency_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT region_name FROM ocean_regions ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT p.pollution_level, r.report_id FROM pollution_data p INNER JOIN pollution_reports r ON p.data_id = r.data_id WHERE p.date_collected > '2021-01-01';
SELECT p.pollution_level, s.source_name FROM pollution_data p INNER JOIN pollution_sources s ON p.data_id = s.source_id WHERE p.pollution_level > 50 AND s.source_name LIKE '%factory%';
